definition: cloth/to declare/to announce/to spread/to make known

sentences.english: Her left elbow was wrapped in gauze, but she otherwise appeared alert.
sentences.chinese: 她左臂用紗布裹着，但是她還是很警覺的。

sentences.english: The hospital has said, sword has a slight man hands cut, has put on the gauze.
sentences.chinese: 醫院方面稱，動刀男子雙手有輕微割傷，已纏上紗布。

sentences.english: With gauze dipped in some yogurt, deposited in the eye around every ten minutes.
sentences.chinese: 用紗布蘸上些酸奶，敷在眼睛周圍，每次十分鐘。

sentences.english: After wrapping with sterile gauze, the rats were feed separately.
sentences.chinese: 處理完畢後以無菌紗布包紮傷口，動物置於單籠飼養。

sentences.english: The nurse used a sterile gauze to cover his wound.
sentences.chinese: 護士以一塊無菌紗布覆蓋他的傷口。

sentences.english: He put on a pad of gauze and a strip of adhesive tape over the wound .
sentences.chinese: 他在傷口上貼了一塊紗布再加一條橡皮膏。

sentences.english: I am just Shabu in this world.
sentences.chinese: 我只是在這個世界纔是紗布。

sentences.english: The observe group were covered by asepetic JinYinHu, The compare group were covered by asepetic dried gauze.
sentences.chinese: 對照組採用消毒後直接蓋無菌幹紗布。

sentences.english: Immediately take the dog to the vet to avoid tissue loss and permanent damage.
sentences.chinese: 立即帶狗狗去看獸醫避免紗布丟失和永久損傷。

sentences.english: I didn't get any money, but my molar is wrapped in gauze.
sentences.chinese: 我一分錢都沒得到，但我的大牙卻給紗布包起來了。

sentences.english: Additionally one kind of meshy furrow resembles gauze same, plait mark is petty but apparent.
sentences.chinese: 另外一種網狀皺紋像紗布一樣，褶痕細小但明顯。

sentences.english: Once the burn is moisturized, cover it with a sterile gauze bandage.
sentences.chinese: 保溼後，再在傷口處纏上消毒紗布。

sentences.english: Remove the tapes and gauze at ends of the polythene tubings.
sentences.chinese: 用紗布和膠布將膠管一端固定。

sentences.english: She's invisible much of the time, bandaged or in seclusion.
sentences.chinese: 她在大多數時候深居簡出，包在紗布裏或閉門獨處。

sentences.english: Wrap the end of polythene tube with gauze and plaster in position.
sentences.chinese: 取下塑膠管一端的膠布和紗布。

sentences.english: Strain the juice through a piece of gauze or a sieve .
sentences.chinese: 用一塊紗布或過濾網將果汁過濾一下。
